item.description:
The season is not just about heathen commercialism. We should not forget to honour the Flying Spaghetti Monster ;)
Objectivists are so far from the mainstream on many issues, that merely being atheists is a minor 'thoughtcrime'. Nevertheless atheism is an important part of Objectivism. In the USA atheists are one of the most despised minorities. What are the reasons and consequences of this non-conformism?

[On weekends cheap parking is available in the BU Babcock St lot.
Babcock St stop on the Green B line is very close.]

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Salon - Objectivist Approach to Atheism
